base_description: Small, square, white wooden nightstand with simple design.
part_description: One drawer with a round knob, four legs, and a lower shelf. The drawer is centrally positioned under the tabletop. Legs are at each corner, supporting the structure.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides in and out within the frame, held by tracks on either side. The legs support the tabletop and are connected to the lower shelf, providing stability. The knob allows for easy opening and closing of the drawer.
external_interaction_description: Can hold items like lamps or books on top. The drawer stores small objects, while the lower shelf accommodates larger items. Fits beside a bed or sofa, providing accessible storage and surface space in a room.
